patthana15.36:4.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.36:5.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.36:6.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.36:7.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.36:7.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
